content: in chain 4 counts as double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet chain 1 into each of the next 15 double_crochet join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of beginning chain 4 16dc 16 ch1sp r3 slip_stitch to next ch1 space or start new colour in ch1 space beg 3dc cluster* see special stitch instructions ch2 3dc cluster ch2 into each of the next 15 ch1 sps join with a slip_stitch to top of first cluster 16 3dc cluster 16 ch2 sps r4 slip_stitch to next chain space beg 4dc cluster* chain 3 4dc cluster chain 3 into each of the next 15 chain sps join with a slip_stitch to top of the first cluster 16 4dc cluster 16 chain sps r5 slip_stitch twice into chain space beg treble_crochet cluster* ch4 start next treble_crochet cluster in the same space you finished last treble_crochet cluster treble_crochet cluster ch4 into each of the next 15 chain sps note that treble_crochet cluster is done across 2 spaces you should finish the last treble_crochet cluster in the space you started the first join the last treble_crochet cluster to the first in the top loop r6 slip_stitch to chain 4 space or join new colour starting in any chain 4 space chain 1 **5 single_crochet chain 1 in first chain 4 space 1 single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 1 in next chain 4 space 2 double_crochet 2 treble_crochet chain 2 2 treble_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 1 in next chain 4 space 2 double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet chain 1 in next chain 4 space ** repeat 3 more times slip_stitch to first single_crochet r7 chain 1 single_crochet into the next 5 single_crochet single_crochet in chain 1 space single_crochet into next 5 stitches half_double_crochet into chain 1 space half_double_crochet in next 4 stitches 2dc ch2 2dc in corner space half_double_crochet in next 4 stitches half_double_crochet into chain 1 space single_crochet in next 5 stitches single_crochet in chain 1 space * single_crochet into the next 5 stiches single_crochet in chain 1 space single_crochet into next 5 stitches half_double_crochet into chain 1 space half_double_crochet in next 4 stitches 2dc ch2 2dc in corner space half_double_crochet in next 4 stitches half_double_crochet into chain 1 space single_crochet in next 5 stitches single_crochet in chain 1 space * repeat this* until square is complete and slip st to first stitch r8 slip_stitch in next 2 st chain 3 counts as double_crochet 2 double_crochet in same stitch skip 3 st 3dc in next stitch 3 times to corner 3 double_crochet ch2 3 double_crochet in corner skip 3 st 3dc skip 3 st 3dc in next stitch to corner 3 double_crochet ch2 3 double_crochet in corner join with a slip_stitch to third chain of first ch3 r9 slip_stitch in next 3 st beg outside cluster ch2 outside cluster chain 2 repeat to corner in corner 2dc chain 2 2 double_crochet chain 2 join with a slip_stitch to third chain of first chain 3 r10 2sc in each ch2 space single_crochet at the top of each cluster
